mapper.insert: insert into posts(post_writer_no, post_title, post_content, post_hit) value (#{postWriterNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, 0)
mapper.select: select p.*, u.user_nick from posts p join users u on u.user_no = p.post_writer_no order by post_reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: delete from posts where post_no = #{postNo} and post_writer_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into post_comments(user_no, post_no, comment_text) values (#{userNo}, #{postNo}, #{commentText})
